org.fujion.thread

Class ThreadedTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.thread.ThreadedTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Future<ThreadedTask>, ICancellable

    public class ThreadedTask
extends Object
implements Runnable, ICancellable, Future<ThreadedTask>
    Used to run long operations in the background. Uses events to notify the requester of completion.

    Note: reference getException() to evaluate any exception the task may have thrown. You may also invoke rethrow(). One of these methods should be referenced to ensure that the task successfully completed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadedTask

        public ThreadedTask(ThreadedTask.TaskExecutor task,
                    BaseComponent requester)
        Creates a runnable for executing a task in the background using the default event name for notification of completion. The task is guaranteed to be executed in the execution context of the requester.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to be performed in the background thread..
        requester - The component requesting the operation.

      • ThreadedTask

        public ThreadedTask(ThreadedTask.TaskExecutor task,
                    BaseComponent requester,
                    String eventName)
        Creates a runnable for executing a task in the background using the specified event name for notification of completion. The task is guaranteed to be executed in the execution context of the requester.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to be performed in the background thread..
        requester - The component requesting the operation.
        eventName - Name of the event used to notify requester of completion. When fired, the data associated with the event will be a reference to this instance and may be interrogated to determine the outcome of the operation.

      • rethrow

        public void rethrow()
             throws Throwable
        Throws the saved exception in the current thread. If there is no saved exception, no action is taken.
        Throws:
        Throwable - when exception was thrown via IRunnable task
